entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:34 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:34 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
